ShortDescription.Value: Start fires with the click of a button.

Publish.LongDescription:
This is a very simple mod containing only one function -- a button to toggle your mouse clicks to create fires on everything clicked.
Note: Unfortuantely, the game has a limit of about 40-50 maximum fire graphics it will render simultaneously (the fire will still affect the building, but all you'll see is the icon). Hopefully in the future I can figure out a way around this,
Future plans: * Support new or larger fire brush types * Support configurable fire intensities * Support explosions * Potentially support other types of disasters (volcanoes, meteors, floods, etc).
